column4: i know that this is the wrong place but can sombody help me with xubuntu question?
what version of ubuntu are you using?
i've forgot how do i check?
its a known issue and its being worked on its been broken for about a week
u lost me there, what is theown bug?
xubuntu is unusable/uninstallable atm there was an update for a lib that broke everything check back in here if im around ill let you know when its fixed
is that what you installed is xubuntu or ubuntu +xubuntu-desktop?
what does it say on login?
or do you get in than nothing works
no i have no user to chose
so i have to use the failsafe way...
when you get to xubuntu login page if you type your user name and user password what happens?
thats the thing, ive never got to chose a user when i installed

ok yes that is sounding like same issue (atleast that could be caused by the same library) here are a feww choices  1. you can download burn install ubuntu 2. you can wait for a fix for xubuntu <not sure how long atm but i would think within a week> or you can go to ctrl+alt+f2 and when you get to tty2 type what soundray gave you than install ubuntu-desktop and use gnome until fixed
